PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-18302008-12-03,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada of MARC MAYER of Montréal, Quebec, as Director of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, effective January 19, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
